Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.Controllers

Class MainController3

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.Controllers.MainController3
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class MainController3 extends Object implements GUIController
This is the main controller for the 3 player scene
Author:
Luca Bresciani

    • showArchipelago

      public void showArchipelago(int archipelagoSize, int motherNature, HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<Color>> islandsStudents, HashMap<Integer,Tower> towerColorMap, HashMap<Integer,Integer> numTowersMap, HashMap<Integer,Boolean> bannedIslands)
      This method is used tho show the archipelago of islands
      Parameters:
      archipelagoSize - is the number of islands
      motherNature - is the index of mother nature
      islandsStudents - is a map that associates the integer of each island to the array of students on that island
      towerColorMap - is a map that associates the integer of each island to the Tower on that island
      numTowersMap - is a map that associates the integer of each island to the number of towers on that island
      bannedIslands - is a map that associates the integer of each island to an array of boolean that indicates if the island is banned or not

    • sendIslandIndex

      public void sendIslandIndex(int index)
      This method send an integer message to the server with the index of the clicked island
      Parameters:
      index - is the index to be sent

    • showOtherPlayerEntrance

      public void showOtherPlayerEntrance(ArrayList<Color> colors, int playerIndex)
      This method is used to show the students in others entrance. Depending on the player's index the left board on the scene or the right board on the scene is updated
      Parameters:
      colors - is the array of colors to be shown
      playerIndex - is the index of the player in the array that contains all of them. This index is used to determine on which board display the students

      public void showExpertCard(ArrayList<ExpertCard_ID> expertCards, HashMap<Integer,ArrayList<Color>> studBufferColor, ArrayList<Boolean> usedCard)
      This method is used to show the expert cards
      Parameters:
      expertCards - expert cards to be shown
      studBufferColor - students to put on the card that requires this feature
      usedCard - boolean that indicates if a card has been used or not

    • sendExpertCard

      Parameters:
      index - index to be sent
      expertcard - expert card reference
